_header: Listeneth lordings and ye shullen hear
Title(s): ‘How the Wyse Man Tawght His Son’
Subjects: children, instructions for the behavior of; manners, treatises on; instruction, father to son
_description: ‘How the Wyse Man Tawght His Son’ — nineteen 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Lystyn lordyngis & ye shall hereHow the wyseman tawght his
                    son…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…& Ihesu bryng vs to hys blysseThat for vs bare a crown of
                    thorn

Lam853.First Lines:
Listiniþ lordingis & ȝe schulen hereHow þe wise
                    man tauȝt his sonneAnd take good tent to þis matereAnd
                    leerne it also if ȝe kunne…
Lam853.Last Lines:
…Þerfore my sonne þinke on þisOf al þat y
                    haue seid biformAnd ihesu bringe us to his blisÞat for us bare
                    þe crowne of þorn Amen
